channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: CDC director Susan Monarez is out after less than a month on the job and other agency leaders resign
item.description: The director of the nation's top public health agency is out after less than one month in the job, and several top agency leaders have resigned.

item.title: Trump Enters Uncharted Ground with the Federal Reserve
item.description: The legal landscape in deciding when presidents can fire Fed governors is surprisingly unsettled.

item.title: Why Reaganism Persists
item.description: The American right is stalked by the suspicion that Trumpism is a phase. Is it?

item.title: Sandwich slinger could slip the noose as grand jury refuses to indict

item.title: Brandon Johnson Is a Moron
item.description: He’ll be a perfect foil for Trump.

item.title: Trump ramps up 'economic war' on Russia to force Ukraine peace talks

item.title: D.C. mayor notes major drops in violent crime amid federal crackdown

item.title: The New Medicine Tariffs Are a Prescription for Disaster
item.description: They’ll make Americans sicker, poorer, and less innovative.

item.title: Trump’s Chinese Student Visa Policy Is An Un-American Security Risk
item.description: The correct number of Chinese nationals who should be allowed to study at American universities is zero.

item.title: Trump makes major strides in shutting down taxpayer-funded animal testing

item.title: Court Says Pennsylvania Must Count Mail Ballots With Improperly Dated Envelopes
item.description: The reprinted outer envelope has a colorful box where voters write the date they voted, but somehow, thousands of voters miss the date

item.title: Social Security Is No Longer the Third Rail of American Politics
item.description: It’s proximate cause for a shotgun wedding.

item.title: United Nations Report: ‘Slavery’-Like Rent-A-Womb Industry Should Be Globally Banned
item.description: 'Consent alone does not render surrogacy ethical. It is widely recognized that consent alone cannot justify human rights violations,' the report says.
